keyMoments.title: Absalom Uses Invisibility in Combat
keyMoments.description: Overwhelmed by Sanji's attacks, Absalom activates his Suke Suke no Mi powers to turn invisible and attempt to escape or gain advantage.
keyMoments.significance: Forces Sanji to adapt his fighting strategy and triggers his emotional response about the fruit.

keyMoments.title: Sanji's Connection to the Fruit Hinted
keyMoments.description: Sanji hints at a deeper personal grudge against Absalom related to the Suke Suke no Mi, beyond just rescuing Nami.
keyMoments.significance: Sets up the reveal in Episode 359 about Sanji's lifelong dream of eating this fruit.

abilities.description: The user can turn themselves and anything they touch (living or nonliving) completely invisible.
limitations: Can still be detected through other means like salt coverage
User is still physically present and can be hit if located

abilities.description: The user can make objects and other people invisible by touching them.

reveals.information: Sanji has a deep personal connection to this Devil Fruit and holds a grudge against Absalom for eating it

keyMoments.title: Doppelman Shadow Clone
keyMoments.description: Moria uses his shadow clone Doppelman to trick Luffy, showing the tactical applications of his Devil Fruit.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates why defeating Moria requires more than brute force.

keyMoments.title: Brick Bat Attack
keyMoments.description: Moria transforms his shadow into multiple bat-like creatures that swarm and attack Luffy.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the offensive combat applications of shadow manipulation.

abilities.description: Moria can animate his own shadow as a body double that can fight independently and swap places with him.
limitations: Shadow clone doesn't take real damage

abilities.description: Moria can transform his shadow into multiple bat-like creatures that attack opponents.
Moria has complete control over shadows, including stealing them and inserting them into corpses to create zombies.
limitations: Shadows can be returned with salt
User must be conscious for zombies to remain active

reveals.information: Moria can transform his shadow into offensive bat-like creatures
